title: What should I buy with my Worlds tokens?
body:
I did all the missions, so I've got 680 tokens. They expire in a couple days, and I I'm uncertain on the best way to spend them, so I would like some tips on such. I do not have any associated skins, so borders/etc. are not an option.

Worlds orbs? True Damage orbs? Animated emotes? What's a good buy, what's a sucker's trap, what's a good option in certain scenarios (e.g. emotes for accounts that don't have any)?
